summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue West, from West Armour Street to West Dravus Street; by grading the same; providing for the necessary surface drainage and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition Nos. 98245 and 109073 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
